title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7565 (November 27th, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update Version: 4.0.7565 Released on: November 27th, 2013


Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary 


Changelog:

-------

[H] Leveling

Un'Goro Crater:

Added player tips

Added extra waypoints for additional quest mobs

Moved guide step to a better spawn point for quest

Made minor changes to improve guide consistency


Blasted Lands:

Added player tips

Added extra waypoints for additional quest mobs

Added a missing step for a quest

Made minor changes to improve guide consistency

Added extra waypoints to improve navigation between quests


[B] Reputations

Fixed the "best friends" guides to let players know that they have reached the main goal to prevent any confusion

[H] Professions

Inscription:

Apprentice

Numbers adjusted for Silverleaf, Peacebloom, Earthroot and Bloodthistle.

Journeyman

Numbers adjusted for Mageroyal, Bruiseweed and Briarthorn.

Expert

Typo fixed for Dragon's Teeth, Fadeleaf, Goldthorn and Khadgar's Whisker.

Artisan

Numbers adjusted for Arthas' Tears, Blindweed, Firebloom, Ghost Mushroom, Gromsblood, Purple Lotus and Sungrass.

Grand Master

Numbers adjusted to closer reflect how many are needed.
